title:
LK 2 Pack for Google Pixel 8 Screen Protector with 2 Pack Camera Lens Protector, HD Ultra-thin, 9H Hardness Tempered Glass Screen Protector for Pixel 8; fingerprint Compatible; Military-grade shatterproof; screen protection and camera lens protection;
original visual experience; high-response haptic touch
descriptions:
Introducing the LK 2 Pack for Google Pixel 8 Screen Protector with 2 Pack Camera Lens Protector – the ultimate protection for your Google Pixel 8!

Our screen protectors are made from 9H Hardness Tempered Glass, providing military-grade shatterproof protection for your screen. With an ultra-thin design and edge strengthening, you'll hardly notice it's there, while still enjoying a high-response haptic touch experience. Plus, our screen protectors are fingerprint compatible, so you can still use your phone's biometric features.

But we didn't stop at just protecting your screen. Our package includes 2 camera lens protectors made from the same 9H Hardness Tempered Glass material. These protectors are scratch resistant and shatterproof, ensuring your camera lens remains crystal clear and free from damage.

With our screen and camera lens protectors, you'll maintain the original high-definition visual quality of your Google Pixel 8. And with our installation accessories included, you can easily apply the protectors yourself for a perfect fit.

But that's not all – we also offer lifetime service with customer support. If you ever have any issues with your screen or camera lens protectors, simply contact our customer support team and we'll respond within 24 hours.

Don't wait until it's too late – protect your Google Pixel 8 with the LK 2 Pack for Google Pixel 8 Screen Protector with 2 Pack Camera Lens Protector. Order now and enjoy peace of mind knowing your phone is protected!
